headline: NFP Appoints Jessica Espinoza, Retirement Advisory National Practice Leader, and Stephen Jans, Wealth Management National Practice Leader
summary: NFP, an Aon company and leading property and casualty broker and benefits consultant, announced the appointments of Jessica Espinoza and Stephen Jans as national practice leaders of Retirement Advisory and Wealth Management, respectively. Espinoza, based in Bethesda, Maryland, and Jans, based in Minneapolis, will report to Ed O'Malley, executive vice president, head of Insurance Brokerage and Consulting. This appointment follows Aon's sale of Wealthspire Advisors, Fiducient Advisors, Newport Pri

headline: Lenox Advisors Appoints Colleen Tinch as Senior Vice President, Head of Marketing
summary: Lenox Advisors, Inc., an affiliate of NFP, an Aon company, and a leading wealth and insurance advisory firm serving high net-worth individuals, families, and corporate clients, today announced the appointment of Colleen Tinch as Senior Vice President, Head of Marketing. Based in Chicago, Tinch brings over 20 years of strategic marketing and relationship management experience in financial services to accelerate Lenox Advisors' growth trajectory and enhance client engagement across all business li

headline: Wealthspire Launches Integrated Platform Across Wealth, Institutional, and Retirement Markets
summary: NEW YORK, November 03, 2025--With the completion of Madison Dearborn Partners’ acquisition of five NFP businesses from Aon on Oct. 30, 2025, Wealthspire has established itself as a newly-formed independent firm to serve clients across the wealth, institutional, and retirement markets.

raw.headline: Wealthspire Launches Integrated Platform Across Wealth, Institutional, and Retirement Markets
raw.summary: NEW YORK, November 03, 2025--With the completion of Madison Dearborn Partners’ acquisition of five NFP businesses from Aon on Oct. 30, 2025, Wealthspire has established itself as a newly-formed independent firm to serve clients across the wealth, institutional, and retirement markets.

headline: Aon reports 32% rise in net income in Q3 2025
summary: The company's total revenues stood at $3.99bn (£3.04bn) in Q3 2025, a 7% gain from the previous year's corresponding quarter.

raw.headline: Aon reports 32% rise in net income in Q3 2025
raw.summary: The company's total revenues stood at $3.99bn (£3.04bn) in Q3 2025, a 7% gain from the previous year's corresponding quarter.

headline: Private-Equity Firm Combines Businesses To Form Wealth Management Juggernaut
summary: Newly reconstituted Wealthspire will have $580 billion in client assets in private accounts and retirement plans.

raw.headline: Private-Equity Firm Combines Businesses To Form Wealth Management Juggernaut
raw.summary: Newly reconstituted Wealthspire will have $580 billion in client assets in private accounts and retirement plans.

headline: $580B Wealthspire RIA Taking Shape After Madison Dearborn Acquisition
summary: The combined RIA will operate under the Wealthspire brand, backed by a fresh $1 billion in debt financing and five firms with a history of collaboration, according to CEO Mike LaMena.

raw.headline: $580B Wealthspire RIA Taking Shape After Madison Dearborn Acquisition
raw.summary: The combined RIA will operate under the Wealthspire brand, backed by a fresh $1 billion in debt financing and five firms with a history of collaboration, according to CEO Mike LaMena.

headline: What Aon (AON)’s Strong Q3 Earnings and Business Refocus Mean for Shareholders
summary: Aon plc recently reported third-quarter 2025 earnings, posting US$3.99 billion in revenue, up from US$3.72 billion a year earlier, alongside increased net income and stronger basic and diluted earnings per share from continuing operations versus the prior year. The company also completed the sale of most of its wealth businesses, refocusing on core operations while advancing a multi-year global data and AI transformation to improve client service and capabilities. We'll examine how Aon's...
